If you love the building games, you should Minecraft Classic play for free on computer and Build anything you can imagine with the blocks.

Start a game and discover a new world.

Minecraft Classic offers a different environment with each connection. Every time you start a new game you have to adapt your constitutions to the landscape and the environment.

Build alone or with the help of other players

If you played with Lego bricks as a child, you probably know the great feeling of creating your own designs. In Minecraft Classic you can build anything you want without limits. You can Build a custom world all by yourself or with the help of other players in multiplayer mode.

Is this Minecraft free?

Minecraft Classic is an old version of Minecraft, it is no longer developed. But you can still play for free, alone or with other games. Unlike the paid version, you need in Minecraft Classic not to fight to survive.

Access this Minecraft for free via browser and discover why this game has addicted so many users.
